reviewText: This was worth buying for myself because I am new to tree decorating, aside from the decorations that can be purchased at Target.

It focused on putting ornaments, garland and flowers on the tree, nothing any 10 year old can't do. When finished it was a pretty shotty looking tree. No information about lights or how to do anything professional looking at all. Very disapointed. I gave it 2 stars because it has a section on wreaths and bows. 95% of which any small crafter can do. I got 2 ideas from it, learned nothing new. Do yourself a favor buy a book you'll get more from it.

I love, love, LOVE this video! It starts a little slow with some basic tree set up tips, and helpful guidelines about how much lighting to use. Once it progressed to Garlands I was hooked.

The techniques in this video will save HOURS of time and give better results.

It is the only video/kindle guide of this genre that I have been able to locate.

If you want a gorgeous tree in less time then this is the guide for you!
